cards.title: Grue
gameplay: If you can use {Trigger} powers this card gains the power:
[b]Power:[/b] Select a player. That player may use a{BR}        power now
powers: Put a Darkness card into play next to {GrueCharacter}. Put a Darkness card into play next to another target.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 1
{GrueCharacter} deals 2 melee damage to a target

cards.title: Darkness
body: This card doesn't reduce damage dealt by {GrueCharacter}
Reduce the first damage that would be dealt each turn by the card next to this card by 1
Reduce the first damage that would be dealt each turn to the card next to this card by 1
At the end of {GrueCharacter}'s next turn remove this card from the game
cards.flavorText: An absolute lack of light{BR}that left me unable to tell whether{BR}my eyes were open or shut,{BR}it was ominous.

cards.title: Blinding
body: {GrueCharacter} deals 2 melee damage to a non-hero target.
If you deal damage to a target with a Darkness card next to it you may destroy an Ongoing card
cards.flavorText: A shadow fell over my vision,{BR}like a jet black curtain sweeping{BR}in front of me,

cards.title: Canny Combatant
body: {GrueCharacter} deals X melee damage to a non-hero target, where X = 2 + the number of Ongoing cards in play
cards.flavorText: An instant after I realized that{BR}I didn't actually have bugs on Browbeat,{BR}the figure struck Vista across the side{BR}of the head, laying her flat.

cards.title: Hide and Recover
body: Put a Darkness card in play next to a hero character card.
That hero regains 2 HP and that hero's player may draw 2 cards

cards.title: Hand-to-Hand Assault
body: {GrueCharacter} deals 2 melee damage to a non-hero target. If that target has a Darkness card next to it {GrueCharacter} deals that target another 2 melee damage

flavorQuotes.text: Don't bring your arm so far back{BR}before you punch. You're just broadcasting{BR}what you're about to do

cards.title: Darken the Area
body: Until the start of your next turn whenever an environment target enters play put a Darkness card next to it
You may destroy an environment card
cards.flavorText: Grue raised his arms,{BR}and filled the street with darkness.

cards.title: Snatch and Grab
body: Destroy up to 2 Ongoing cards

flavorQuotes.text: Brian's new powers.{BR}He was copying powers from the people who were in the darkness, yeah?

cards.title: Cover the Getaway
body: Put a Darkness card next to each hero character card
You may destroy an Environment card
cards.flavorText: If Grue was doing what we'd{BR}planned, he was filling every street{BR}and side street we passed{BR}with darkness.

cards.title: Skull Helmet
body: Whenever a Darkness card is placed next to a target, {GrueCharacter} may deal that target 1 psychic damage
cards.flavorText: The full-face visor was sculpted{BR}to look like a stylized skull,{BR}and was as black as{BR}the rest of his costume

cards.title: Leathers
body: Reduce non-psychic damage dealt to {GrueCharacter} by 1
cards.flavorText: He was dressed entirely in black,{BR}a costume I realized was basically{BR}motorcycle leathers and a{BR}motorcycle helmet.

cards.title: Second Trigger
body: For the rest of the game increase damage dealt to {GrueCharacter} by 1
For the rest of the game you may use {Trigger} powers
Remove this card from the game

cards.title: Leadership
body: Increase damage dealt by hero targets by 1
cards.flavorText: Grue took a leadership role when{BR}needed, but he wasn't in charge of us.{BR}Not exactly.

cards.title: Stillness
body: Reduce all fire, sonic, lightning, and energy damage that would be dealt to or by a target with a Darkness card next to it by 1

flavorQuotes.text: It's not just hearing.{BR}It also cuts off radio signals{BR}and dampens the effects of radiation.

cards.title: Martial Talent
body: Increase melee damage dealt by {GrueCharacter} by 1
cards.flavorText: As he explained it, he was more{BR}interested in the broader strokes{BR}and philosophy of a given style{BR}than on the particulars.

cards.title: Spew Darkness
body: When this card enters play {GrueCharacter} deals himself 3 psychic damage; then put a Darkness card into play next to a hero character card.
Hero targets with a Darkness card next to them are immune to damage dealt by non-hero targets.
At the start of your turn destroy this card
cards.flavorText: More of it just kept pouring{BR}from his hand, climbing upwards{BR}to cover the top of the room.
